kv18.2:1.6: Abhinimmito jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
kv18.2:2.6: Āyasmā ānando jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
kv18.2:3.6: vitthārenapi kho ahaṃ, sāriputta, dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ;
kv18.2:3.7: saṃkhittavitthārenapi kho ahaṃ, sāriputta, dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ;
kv18.2:3.11: Tena hi buddhena bhagavatā dhammo desitoti.
kv18.2:4.6: sanidānāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desemi, no anidānaṃ;
kv18.2:4.7: sappāṭihāriyāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desemi, no appāṭihāriyaṃ;
kv18.2:4.8: tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññāya dhammaṃ desayato no anabhiññāya, sanidānaṃ dhammaṃ desayato no anidānaṃ, sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desayato no appāṭihāriyaṃ karaṇīyo ovādo karaṇīyā anusāsanī;
kv18.2:4.9: alañca pana vo, bhikkhave, tuṭṭhiyā alaṃ attamanatāya alaṃ somanassāya—
kv18.2:4.10: sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṃgho’ti.
kv18.2:4.11: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne dasasahassilokadhātu akampitthā”ti.
kv18.2:4.14: Tena hi buddhena bhagavatā dhammo desitoti.
